languages.text: {n}Свиток, выползающий из печатного станка инскрибера, продолжает расти — пергамент, сворачиваясь, волнами ложится на пол. За стуком нажимаемых клавиш почти не слышно хруста ломаемых костей. Спустя несколько минут, окончательно раздробив пальцы и забрызгав кровью инскрибер, лексмеханик продолжает безуспешно давить на кнопки ошметками костяшек и кожи. Дознаватель обрывает пергамент и начинает проглядывать его, иногда морщась и отводят взгляд, словно у него болят глаза.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Свиток, выползающий из печатного станка инскрибера, продолжает расти — пергамент, сворачиваясь, волнами ложится на пол. За стуком нажимаемых клавиш почти не слышно хруста ломаемых костей. Спустя несколько минут, окончательно раздробив пальцы и забрызгав кровью инскрибер, лексмеханик продолжает безуспешно давить на кнопки ошметками костяшек и кожи.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The scroll that creeps out of the inscriber's printer continues to grow, undulating in waves of parchment that settle on the floor. The crunch of breaking bones can scarcely be heard over the hammering of the keys. After several minutes, the Lexmechanic's fingers are well and truly crushed and blood is spattered over the inscriber, but that does not stop him trying in vain to press the keys with the scraps of bones and skin that remain. Heinrix tears off the parchment and skims his eyes over it, sometimes frowning and looking away as though his eyes are paining him.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Свиток, выползающий из печатного станка инскрибера, продолжает расти — пергамент, сворачиваясь, волнами ложится на пол. За стуком нажимаемых клавиш почти не слышно хруста ломаемых костей. Спустя несколько минут, окончательно раздробив пальцы и забрызгав кровью инскрибер, лексмеханик продолжает безуспешно давить на кнопки ошметками костяшек и кожи. Дознаватель обрывает пергамент и начинает проглядывать его, иногда морщась и отводят взгляд, словно у него болят глаза.{/n}

languages.text: {n}抄录器的打印机中钻出来的卷轴变得越来越长，羊皮纸像波浪一样上下起伏，落在地上。在键盘巨大的敲击声中，隐隐能听到骨头断裂的脆响。几分钟后，思律机僧的手指真的被碾碎了，鲜血溅在抄录器上。但即便如此，他也依然在用残存的骨片与破碎的皮肉，徒劳地想要按下按键。海因里希撕下了羊皮纸，目光落在纸上。偶尔，他会皱起眉头看向别处，仿佛他的眼睛在隐隐作痛。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The scroll that creeps out of the inscriber's printer continues to grow, undulating in waves of parchment that settle on the floor. The crunch of breaking bones can scarcely be heard over the hammering of the keys. After several minutes, the Lexmechanic's fingers are well and truly crushed and blood is spattered over the inscriber, but that does not stop him trying in vain to press the keys with the scraps of bones and skin that remain. Heinrix tears off the parchment and skims his eyes over it, sometimes frowning and looking away as though his eyes are paining him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}抄录器的打印机中钻出来的卷轴变得越来越长，羊皮纸像波浪一样上下起伏，落在地上。在键盘巨大的敲击声中，隐隐能听到骨头断裂的脆响。几分钟后，法律技工的手指真的被碾碎了，鲜血溅在抄录器上。但即便如此，他也依然在用残存的骨片与破碎的皮肉，徒劳地想要按下按键。海因里希撕下了羊皮纸，目光落在纸上。偶尔，他会皱起眉头看向别处，仿佛他的眼睛在隐隐作痛。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El pergamino que surge de la impresora del inscriptor sigue creciendo, cayendo en oleadas hasta el suelo. El crujido de los huesos al romperse queda casi ahogado bajo el martilleo de las teclas. Tras unos minutos, los dedos del lexmecánico quedan completamente destrozados y el inscriptor está empapado de sangre, pero eso no le impide seguir intentando en vano pulsar las teclas con los restos de piel y hueso que le quedan. Heinrix arranca el pergamino y lo examina con la mirada, frunciendo ocasionalmente el entrecejo y apartando la vista como si le hiciera daño a los ojos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The scroll that creeps out of the inscriber's printer continues to grow, undulating in waves of parchment that settle on the floor. The crunch of breaking bones can scarcely be heard over the hammering of the keys. After several minutes, the Lexmechanic's fingers are well and truly crushed and blood is spattered over the inscriber, but that does not stop him trying in vain to press the keys with the scraps of bones and skin that remain. Heinrix tears off the parchment and skims his eyes over it, sometimes frowning and looking away as though his eyes are paining him.{/n}

Tras unos minutos, los dedos del lexmecánico quedan completamente destrozados y el inscriptor está empapado de sangre, pero eso no le impide seguir intentando en vano pulsar las teclas con los restos de piel y hueso que le quedan. Heinrix arranca el pergamino y lo examina con la mirada, frunciendo ocasionalmente el entrecejo y apartando la vista como si le hiciera daño a los ojos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}インスクライバーから這い出てきたスクロールは、羊皮紙のごとくうねりながら伸び続け、床に流れていく。キーが打ち鳴らされる音に混じって、骨が折れる音がかすかに聞こえる。数分後、法技術者の指は完全に潰れ、血しぶきがインスクライバーの上に飛び散ったが、それでも彼は残った骨と皮膚の破片でキーを押そうとするのを止めなかった。ハインリックスは羊皮紙を引き剥がし、時々顔をしかめて目をそらしながらも目を通していった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The scroll that creeps out of the inscriber's printer continues to grow, undulating in waves of parchment that settle on the floor. The crunch of breaking bones can scarcely be heard over the hammering of the keys. After several minutes, the Lexmechanic's fingers are well and truly crushed and blood is spattered over the inscriber, but that does not stop him trying in vain to press the keys with the scraps of bones and skin that remain. Heinrix tears off the parchment and skims his eyes over it, sometimes frowning and looking away as though his eyes are paining him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}インスクライバーから這い出てきたスクロールは、羊皮紙のごとくうねりながら伸び続け、床に流れていく。キーが打ち鳴らされる音に混じって、骨が折れる音がかすかに聞こえる。数分後、法技術者の指は完全に潰れ、血しぶきがインスクライバーの上に飛び散ったが、それでも彼は残った骨と皮膚の破片でキーを押そうとするのを止めなかった。ハインリックスは羊皮紙を引き剥がし、時々顔をしかめて目をそらしながらも目を通していった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Schriftrolle, die der Drucker des Beschrifters ausgibt, wird immer länger und reicht bald in einer langen Pergamentwelle bis auf den Boden. Das Hämmern auf die Tasten übertönt fast vollständig das Geräusch brechender Knochen. Nach einige Minuten sind die Finger des Lexmechanicus komplett zerschmettert, und der Beschrifter ist blutverschmiert, was den Mann aber nicht daran hindert, vergeblich weiterhin zu versuchen, die Tasten mit den verbliebenen Knochensplittern und Hautfetzen zu bedienen. Heinrix reißt das Pergament ab und überfliegt es, wobei er manchmal die Augen zusammenkneift und den Blick abwendet, als bereite ihm das Geschriebene Schmerzen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The scroll that creeps out of the inscriber's printer continues to grow, undulating in waves of parchment that settle on the floor. The crunch of breaking bones can scarcely be heard over the hammering of the keys. After several minutes, the Lexmechanic's fingers are well and truly crushed and blood is spattered over the inscriber, but that does not stop him trying in vain to press the keys with the scraps of bones and skin that remain. Heinrix tears off the parchment and skims his eyes over it, sometimes frowning and looking away as though his eyes are paining him.{/n}

Heinrix reißt das Pergament ab und überfliegt es, wobei er manchmal die Augen zusammenkneift und den Blick abwendet, als bereite ihm das Geschriebene Schmerzen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le parchemin qui sort de l'inscriveur ne cesse de s'allonger, ondulant comme des vagues jusqu'au sol. Le lexmécanicien martèle si violemment le clavier que l'on entend à peine le craquement de ses os qui se brisent. Au bout de plusieurs minutes, ses doigts sont complètement écrasés, et l'inscriveur est couvert de sang, mais il continue vainement à essayer d'appuyer sur les touches avec ses moignons. Heinrix arrache le parchemin et le survole, fronçant parfois les sourcils et détournant le regard comme si ce qu'il voyait lui faisait mal aux yeux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The scroll that creeps out of the inscriber's printer continues to grow, undulating in waves of parchment that settle on the floor. The crunch of breaking bones can scarcely be heard over the hammering of the keys. After several minutes, the Lexmechanic's fingers are well and truly crushed and blood is spattered over the inscriber, but that does not stop him trying in vain to press the keys with the scraps of bones and skin that remain. Heinrix tears off the parchment and skims his eyes over it, sometimes frowning and looking away as though his eyes are paining him.{/n}

Heinrix arrache le parchemin et le survole, fronçant parfois les sourcils et détournant le regard comme si ce qu'il voyait lui faisait mal aux yeux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yazıcıdan çıkan kâğıt uzadıkça uzuyor ve nihayet yere düşüyor. Kırılan kemiklerin sesi, tuşlardan gelen gürültünün ardından zorla duyuluyor. Birkaç dakika sonra Lexmekanik'in parmakları tümüyle parçalanıp yazıcının üzerini kanla kaplıyor. Ancak bu durum, et ve kemik kalıntılarıyla tuşlara nafile basmaya çalışmasının önüne geçemiyor. Heinrix parşömeni koparıp gözden geçiriyor. Ara ara yüzünü buruşturup sanki baktığında acıyormuş gibi gözlerini kaçırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The scroll that creeps out of the inscriber's printer continues to grow, undulating in waves of parchment that settle on the floor. After several minutes, the Lexmechanic's fingers are well and truly crushed and blood is spattered over the inscriber, but that does not stop him trying in vain to press the keys with the scraps of bones and skin that remain.
